articles.author: George Ogala
articles.title: AMAA 2021: Somalia's 'The Gravedigger's Wife' leads nominations as Nollywood dominates - Premium Times
articles.description: ‘ The Gravedigger’s Wife’ from Somalia received the most nominations with 10, including nominations for best film in African Language....
articles.content:
The Africa Film Academy organisers have announced the list of nominees for the 17th edition of the award.
The AMAA 2021nominations announcement was held at the Ebony Life Place, Victoria Island, Lag… [+9001 chars]

articles.title: Manhart MHX3 600 unveiled as super BMW X3 M package - Carmag South Africa
articles.description: The BMW X3 M has been given a conclusive performance revision with the new Manhart MHX3 600. Adding some extra flair to the performance SUV is an engine tune-up, some visual enhancements and a revision to the chassis.
